name: pureblue
description:
pureblue is a choice-based, nonlinear, sci-fi interactive fiction about waiting for an .exe to finish running.

This game contains swearing and depictions of bodily harm.

I created this game for Inkjam '21! It's...

  • ...my first ever formal jam entry!
  • ...my first ever time using ink! (Even as a test, since I meant to before the jam and forgot.)
  • ...over 7k words of cyborg OS roleplaying!

My goal with Inkjam was to force myself to use ink on its own terms before using it in a Unity integration. This is a weird little nonlinear story that I may expand on later (it got out from under me, as you can probably tell from the word count), but my favorite thing about it is that it's finished. I hope you enjoy it!

Mobile-compatible. Also available on Github.
